name: Abermaicto
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with clipped vowels
diet of salted fish, kelp cakes, and smoked shellfish
ship-focused rituals; votive offerings at the headland
informal barter networks; coin circulation limited
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
navigational auguries辅助但不能替代航海图与技艺
notes: minor port for reagent imports and island traffic
population unknown; functions as local hub/outpost
